column4: hi all, im complete noob and first time in my life using linux, so i need step-by-step help with qtsim instalation
hi all, im complete noob and first time in my life using linux, so i need step-by-step help with qtsim instalation... Would someone be so kind to guide me trough instalation?
start by looking in menu > system > admin > synaptic , unless you are using kubuntu then ask in #kubuntu
